name: Canvas X Pro Drawing
summary: A CVXCAD file is a drawing created by Canvas GFX Canvas X Pro, a technical illustration program. It may contain raster and vector graphics, text, and shapes, and also includes project drawing settings such as layers and image effects. Canvas X Pro users save various types of drawings as CVXCAD files, such as blueprints, flowcharts, presentations, diagrams, flyers, and maps.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
